Characters.introText1: Hello there, are you okay? You seemed to have crashed your plane.
Characters.introText3: You have landed on our secluded mountain! You seem to be the only survivor...
Characters.introText4: How do I get out of here?
Characters.introText5: Well, the only way off is by defeating Nogard the Dragon, who guards the only exit.
Characters.introText5.1: The exit lies deep within a maze of caves... where Nogard resides.
Characters.introText6: Well... how do you suppose I defeat him??
Characters.introText7: You must fight your way through the caves and face him head-on.
Characters.introText7.1: Collect gold to purchase equipment from the shop to help you along the way!
Characters.introText7.2: Good luck! If you have any questions, I'll be nearby!

Characters.introText2: Hello there, are you new here?
